features: ♥ Powerful Wind ♥ This cute handheld fan is inbuilt with brand new copper made motor, which is powerful enough that can support the blade running at very high speed to produce strong wind, the fluid-mechanical designed cover can strength the wind brought out by the blade, you will feel the wind when 2m away from the fan.

♥ 2 Speeds Adjustable ♥ The mini fan has 2 wind speeds adjustable, you can simply press the power button to change the wind setting, press once for the low speed at 5300RPM, twice for the high speed at 5800RPM, the wind is powerful enough to cool you down quickly.

♥ Rechargeable Battery ♥ Tripole personal fan is powered by the upgraded rechargeable battery, hold charge well and battery life is longer, it comes with the charging cable, you can charge it by the regular socket, power bank, computer or any other device that have a USB port.

♥ Easy to Hold ♥ Designed with the anti-slip handle that conform to ergonomic principle, the portable fan is very easy and comfortable to hold even by small hands, the lollipop shape is unique that would be an ideal gift for stylish girls, boys, men, women and kids.

♥ Small Size ♥ This cute fan only measures 17* 8.2* 2.5cm/ 6.7* 3.1* 1in, 98g/ 0.2lb, you can put it into your pocket or bag, hang on your neck with the lanyard when not use and take it with you wherever you go, it's an ideal partner in such hot summer to keep you cool when travelling, waiting in line or doing sports.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Fan for Every Occasion - Enjoy Cool Breeze Any Time Previous page Next page

2 Speeds Powerful Personal Fan You must be surprised by how powerful it is compare to it's such small size, this portable fan produces strong nature wind to keep you cool in places that don't have air conditioner, it will be a lifesaver during the whole summer. Palm Size Handheld Mini Fan This little fan only measures 17* 8.2* 2.3 cm/ 6.7* 3.1* 0.9 in, weighs 95 g/ 0.2lb, you can put it into pocket or hand bag, connect the lanyard to the fan and hang it around your neck when in no use, take it easily wherever you go.
A cute little gift idea for kids!

Creative Lollipop Design, Nice Gift! Lollipop---Children's Favorite & Adults' Memories. This rechargeable fan is in a lollipop design, very cute and novel, the handle is non-slip, designed in suitable length and width that is very easy to hold even by toddler. We add several colors to enrich your choices, free to choose one that match your summer~

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic handheld fan
reviews.reviewText: Honestly, I was thinking to myself am I really going to do a review for a handheld fan. However, yes I am. We use this fan constantly in my house. We use it to cool off food before giving it to the kids. It gets used almost every meal. It lasts a really long time and is easy to charge. I'm actually on my second one because my daughter dropped the first one and broke it. It's surprisingly high quality for the price. The air flow from this fan is awesome. Would definitely recommend. It's also great for taking with you to travel. When you're stuck taxing on the runway in a hot airplane, there's nothing better than whipping out this handheld fan and getting your own personal little breeze.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars amazing for traveling and daily
reviews.reviewText: i bought 2 of these to take for me and my mom on an international trip. i didn't charge it at all before leaving and it lasted me the whole 3 weeks that I was abroad. i used it almost everyday while traveling and it was very very hot so it was so convenient to whip this out from my purse in a car or in a train to use and it worked great! i liked the 2 speeds, it gave a good amount of cool air on the low speed it has saved me so many times. i would buy 50 more of these if I needed to. for the price it is so worth it. I'm surprised it lasted me an entire 3 weeks abroad without charging it once. it stopped working on my way back and just a few minutes of charging was enough to give it enough juice and its been working well for me even till today on that few minutes charge. i love this product and 100% recommend to anyone. small, portable, cute colors, and a great amount of wind to keep you cool during desperately hot times!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best gift to myself!
reviews.reviewText: My first impression when I bought the fan I thought how could this small fan really put out cold air. Boy, it sure surprised me! I bought this small hand held fan to help me with hot flashes. It has been a life saver for me. I also found it helpful to use when I go to places where it is hot and humid. I am able to place it inside my small purse or a coat pocket. It gives out a lot of power for being small. It comes in two speeds which I found helpful too. When I get a hot flash I use the higher speed to speed up the air and use the low for continuous use. The fan is not loud. It does come in many beautiful colors too. It doesn’t take much to charge. It is light weight and easy to carry around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more dripping in sweat
reviews.reviewText: My hot flashes have been getting me down! This fan has helped tremendously. I have one in my purse and one I keep at work. I wear it around my neck and turn it on when needed. It is very quiet and you charge it with a USB cord that comes with it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Battery life is low
reviews.reviewText: Love the sleekness of this fan. I bought it to attend a concert and it worked out really well. The convenient neck holder it came with was great and it was small enough to fit in my bag. Only downside was the battery life which wasn't enough to stay on the highest setting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this fan to help speed along the process of applying my toners and serum during my skincare routine. It’s light but powerful and stays charged for a pretty long time. It ran out of battery while I was using it recently but I was able to plug it in and use it while it was charging, which was super convenient! The fan itself feels sturdy; I even once accidentally knocked the fan off my bathroom counter onto the hard floor and it did not have a single scratch on it. The strap is very nice as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but mighty!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been carrying around a “stroller fan” for years now, I get overheated in restaurants and stores, and it ruins experiences so I need help cooling down. This little guy is like 1/5 the size, weight, and bulk, and at least twice as powerful! It also works great when setting makeup spray, drying false lashes, etc. I have two now! They would make a fantastic gift idea for those who run warm, for trips to hot weather places (especially theme parks!) and for makeup/skincare enthusiasts! The blue color is beautiful, it’s super lightweight, and charges fast!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Long lasting battery
reviews.reviewText: I got this to go to Dollywood this summer and I’m so glad I did. The battery lasted all day with continuous use. The airflow is strong and cool. It’s the perfect size to throw in a bag and keep for hot days!
